snippet: At least 26 African countries will not vote for Sheikh Salman bin Ebrahim al-Khalifa of Bahrain in the FIFA presidential election.
abstract: Significant number of African countries defy recommendation of continent's soccer federation, refusing to vote for Bahrain's Sheikh Salman bin Ebrahim al-Khalifa in FIFA presidential election; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: At least 26 African countries will not vote for Sheikh Salman bin Ebrahim al-Khalifa of Bahrain in the FIFA presidential election.

headline.main: African Vote May Be Split in FIFA Election
